item.title: MIUI V13.0.6.0.SLMCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi K40S China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi K40S China

Codename: munch

Version: V13.0.6.0.SLMCNXM | 12.0

Size: 5.9 GB

MD5: 9127e1c9becc2723da50fb881f2290cc

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: Touchscreen experience
Fix: CPU got overloaded in some cases when a device was used in well-lit outdoor environments
[MIUI+]
Optimization: Better MIUI+ connectivity for mobile devices and computers

item.title: MIUI V13.0.7.0.SLMCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K40S China
item.description:
New Stable Beta Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K40S China

Codename: munch

Version: V13.0.7.0.SLMCNXM | 12.0

Size: 4.2 GB

MD5: 4d8e90d2c36f0c8744a03fe3e768c27e

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: Touch controls in games
[Basic improvements]
Fix: Other issues
[System]
Fix: Some third party themes generated noise in the speaker
[Control center]
Fix: Control center froze in some cases
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Fix: The issue that created a permanent notification for Gallery

Download: Here
